meanings.sent1: She poetises beautiful verses about nature.
meanings.sent2: He poetises every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat poetises a haiku about chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: Her pen poetises emotions onto paper effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The old tree poetises its life story through its rings.
